name: Station 22 by Daytona's
text:
HAND HELDS
ADD SIDE CAESAR SALAD, GARDEN SALAD OR TATER TOTS $5. LOAD YOUR TOTS FOR $2

BLACKENED CHICKEN SANDWICH $13
PULLED CHICKEN DIPPED WITH HOUSE BLACKENING SPICE, GOUDA, BACON, BUFFALO MAYO, TOMATO, FOCACCIA

STATION BURGER $13
SMASH BURGER, AMERICAN CHEESE, STATION SAUCE, PICKLES, SHREDDED LETTUCE, RED ONION, KAISER

BOURDAIN STACK $13
MORTADELLA, PROSCIUTTO, PROVOLONE, PICKLED RED ONION, PESTO MAYO, ARUGULA, KAISER

STEAKHOUSE BURGER $13
SMASH BURGER, BLUE CHEESE SPREAD, HONEY PEPPER BACON, GARLIC-BASIL MAYO, CRISPY ONIONS, KAISER

HOT HONEY BUFFALO CHICKEN WRAP $13

BIRRIA GRILLED CHEESE $13

CAPRESE PIZZA SANDWICH $13

CRUNCH WRAP $13
BLACKENED GROUND BEEF, SHREDDED LETTUCE, PICO DE GALLO, SUPREMA SAUCE, CHEDDAR + MOZZA, CRUSHED TORTILLA CHIPS, FLOUR TORTILLA

PIZZA
ALL PIZZAS ARE SERVED ON AGOSTINO'S PIZZA DOUGH WITH HOUSE PIZZA SPICE. MAKE ANY PIZZA A CALZONE FOR $1!

HOT HONEY PEPPERONI $25

MEAT LOVERS $25

HAWAIIAN $25
MARINARA, MOZZARELLA, PROSCIUTTO, GRILLED PINEAPPLE, BANANA PEPPER, RED ONION, CILANTRO LIME MAYO

TUSCAN CHICKEN $25
ROASTED CHICKEN, SUN DRIED TOMATO, ROASTED RED PEPPERS, ARUGULA, ROASTED GARLIC + PESTO BASE, BALSAMIC GLAZE, PEPPERONI, MOZZARELLA

CHICKEN CAESAR $25
PULLED CHICKEN, CAESAR DRESSING, HONEY PEPPER BACON, SHREDDED ROMAINE, PEPPERONI, ROMANO, MOZZARELLA

MUSHROOM + ARUGULA $23
GARLIC BASIL + PESTO BASE, ROASTED MUSHROOMS, MOZZARELLA, PEPPERONI, CARAMELIZED ONION, SUN DRIED TOMATO, BALSAMIC GLAZE

ITALIAN $25
MARINARA, MOZZARELLA, PROSCIUTTO, MORTADELLA, PEPPERONI, PROVOLONE, CHILI FLAKES, BASIL

PEPPERONI $24
MARINARA, MOZZARELLA, CUP + CHAR PEPPERONI, BROOKLYN PEPPERONI

HOT DOGS
ADD SIDE CAESAR SALAD, GARDEN SALAD OR TOTS $5. LOAD YOUR TOTS FOR $2

BIG MAC $8

HAWAIIAN $8

HOT HONEY PROSCIUTTO DIP $13

ROMAINE, BIRRIA BEEF, CORN SALSA, SEASONED TORTILLA CHIPS, CONSOMÃ‰, CHIPOTLE VINAIGRETTE, CILANTRO LIME CREMA, CHEDDAR + MOZZARELLA

NACHOS $24
